title: Orecchiette With Broccoli Rabe
summary: Orecchiette With Broccoli Rabe might be just the main course you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains roughly 45g of protein, 72g of fat, and a total of 1185 calories. This recipe serves 4. For $3.17 per serving, this recipe covers 47% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. If you have sausages, semolinan orecchiette, garlic, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the olive oil you could follow this main course with the Sauteed Banana, Granolan and Yogurt Parfait as a dessert. This recipe is liked by 5 foodies and cooks. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 93%. This score is outstanding. Try Orecchiette ai broccoletti (Orecchiette Pasta with Broccoli Rabe), Orecchiette with Broccoli Rabe (Orecchiette con Cime di Rapa), and Orecchiette With Broccoli Rabe for similar recipes.
